body_html: @topiaruss Sorry about the inconvenience. The reason we moved it is because we'll be adding some new Docker images to the repo soon, and we didn't want to privilege one over any other one. I opened PR #6051 for how to build the Dockerfile in the new location; it is not too much more complicated, so I hope you'll bear with us :)

body: @topiaruss Sorry about the inconvenience. The reason we moved it is because we'll be adding some new Docker images to the repo soon, and we didn't want to privilege one over any other one. I opened PR #6051 for how to build the Dockerfile in the new location; it is not *too* much more complicated, so I hope you'll bear with us :)
